column1: wilma lucille nall| wilma lucille nall
column2: age 87 of alma passed away saturday june 13
column3: 2015 after an extended illness at the bacon co. hospital. she was a native of bacon county and the daughter of the late lucious theron turner and eula mae dyal turner. she was also preceded in death by her husband waymon medders nall and son c. glenn nall. survivors include one son bruce nall of alma
column4: three grandchildren and two great grandchildren. the family will be receiving friends at her residence sunday june 14th at 3 pm. crosby funeral home is in charge of the arrangements.
